name: D-erythrose 4-phosphate:NAD+ oxidoreductase; D-Erythrose 4-phosphate + NAD+ + H2O <=> 4-Phospho-D-erythronate + NADH + H+
beta-D-Glucose-6-phosphate:NADP+ 1-oxoreductase; beta-D-Glucose 6-phosphate + NADP+ <=> D-Glucono-1,5-lactone 6-phosphate + NADPH + H+
beta-D-Glucose:oxygen 1-oxidoreductase; beta-D-Glucose + Oxygen <=> D-Glucono-1,5-lactone + Hydrogen peroxide
glyceraldehyde ferredoxin oxidoreductase; D-Glyceraldehyde + H2O + Oxidized ferredoxin <=> D-Glycerate + H+ + Reduced ferredoxin
Isocitrate:NADP+ oxidoreductase; Isocitrate + NADP+ <=> Oxalosuccinate + NADPH + H+
